function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Limited literature on the adequacy of gated communities in different contexts","Impact":"Inadequate understanding of the effectiveness of gated communities as a disease mitigation measure","Mitigation":"Conduct additional studies in different contexts to expand findings","Technologies":"Research methodologies and data analysis tools","People":"Researchers, urban planners, policymakers","Owner":"Research institutions, government agencies"},{"Description":"Lack of investigation into negative aspects of gated communities as pandemic protection solutions","Impact":"Inability to assess the potential risks and drawbacks of gated communities during a pandemic","Mitigation":"Conduct additional investigations into the negative aspects of gated communities","Technologies":"Epidemiological research methods, survey tools","People":"Researchers, public health experts","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Insufficient medical evidence on the impact of gated communities on COVID-19 infection rate","Impact":"Uncertainty regarding the role of gated communities in influencing COVID-19 spread","Mitigation":"Conduct investigations using medical evidence to determine impact on infection rate","Technologies":"Epidemiological analysis tools, data collection methods","People":"Epidemiologists, public health researchers","Owner":"Health research institutions"},{"Description":"Lack of market study on expected demand for gated communities in post-pandemic era","Impact":"Uncertainty in housing planning and market dynamics post-pandemic","Mitigation":"Conduct a market study to assess expected demand for gated communities","Technologies":"Market research tools, data analysis methods","People":"Real estate developers, housing planners, market analysts","Owner":"Real estate development firms, market research organizations"}]}
